findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions by setting maxBuyLimit and maxWalletLimit to zero, potentially operating as a honeypot.

findings.title: OCTD - Transfers Contract's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of the contract by calling the rescueAnyBEP20Tokens function, which may allow them to take advantage of it.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceeds Fees Limit
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the setSellTaxes function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: BC - Blacklists Addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop addresses from transactions by calling the blacklistAddress function.

findings.title: ZD - Zero Division
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of the transfer methods is successful according to the ERC20 specification.

findings.title: SPC - Solidity Precision Concern
findings.description: Potential precision loss due to incorrect order of operations.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: Remove redundant statements to decrease code size and rewrite some code segments for better performance.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L03 - Redundant Statements
findings.description: Remove the redundant statements in order to decrease the code size.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant. Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.
